    • initData

      public void initData​(UserList ul, int i, int alb)
      User list initialization. This method keeps track of the current user, user index and album that the application is being operated on.
      Parameters:
      ul - User List Instance
      i - User index in User List
      alb - album index in albums

    • addPic

      public void addPic​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
